docs.abstract: Mr. Bloomberg brings a huge personal fortune and moderate views to an increasingly fluid race, but issues like criminal justice and his late start loom as vulnerabilities.
docs.snippet: Mr. Bloomberg brings a huge personal fortune and moderate views to an increasingly fluid race, but issues like criminal justice and his late start loom as vulnerabilities.
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg announced on Sunday that he would run for president in 2020, bringing his enormous wealth and eclectic political biography into the tumultuous Democratic primary and seeking to win over skeptical liberal voters by presenting himself as a multibillion-dollar threat to President Trump.

headline.main: Michael Bloomberg Joins 2020 Democratic Field for President
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg Hits Democratic Presidential Race Running to the Center

docs.abstract: Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders’s awkward history was evident on the debate stage.
docs.snippet: Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders’s awkward history was evident on the debate stage.
docs.lead_paragraph: Hi. Welcome to On Politics, your guide to the day in national politics. I’m Giovanni Russonello, your morning newsletter writer taking over your evening edition.

docs.abstract: Michael R. Bloomberg said that he had not been aware of the practice until he was contacted by a reporter, but that his campaign ended its relationship with the company immediately.
docs.snippet: Michael R. Bloomberg said that he had not been aware of the practice until he was contacted by a reporter, but that his campaign ended its relationship with the company immediately.
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg said on Tuesday that his presidential campaign would no longer work with a vendor after learning of a subcontractor that had been involved in using prison workers to make phone calls on behalf of his candidacy.

headline.main: Bloomberg Drops Vendor Connected to Prison Labor
headline.print_headline: Vendor Let Go By Bloomberg Over a Link To Prison Labor

docs.abstract: California is the linchpin of Mr. Sanders’s 2020 strategy, a state he hopes will turbocharge his campaign on Super Tuesday — or revive his candidacy if he underperforms in the early states.
docs.snippet: California is the linchpin of Mr. Sanders’s 2020 strategy, a state he hopes will turbocharge his campaign on Super Tuesday — or revive his candidacy if he underperforms in the early states.
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Four years ago, Marlene MacAulay experienced her political awakening during Senator Bernie Sanders’s first presidential campaign.

headline.main: How Bernie Sanders Learned to Love Campaigning in California
headline.print_headline: A ‘Run-and-Gun’ No More, Sanders’s Campaign Makes California Its Main Priority

docs.abstract: All summer, she was soaring, slinging buzzy plans and climbing in the polls. It’s not summer anymore.
docs.snippet: All summer, she was soaring, slinging buzzy plans and climbing in the polls. It’s not summer anymore.
docs.lead_paragraph: VINTON, Iowa — Elizabeth Warren motors onstage at her campaign events like she is being chased: arm-pump, arm-pump, mid-jog wave. O.K.! Let’s get this thing going.

headline.main: Elizabeth Warren Has Done the Hard Part. Now Comes the Harder Part.
headline.print_headline: Warren Has Done the Hard Part.  Now May Come the Harder Part.

docs.abstract: Elizabeth Warren delivered a major speech exactly a year after she entered the presidential race, restating her case against corruption while projecting optimism heading into 2020.
docs.snippet: Elizabeth Warren delivered a major speech exactly a year after she entered the presidential race, restating her case against corruption while projecting optimism heading into 2020.
docs.lead_paragraph: BOSTON — Marking a year since she began her campaign for president and seeking to frame the final five-week sprint to Iowa where much of her candidacy hinges, Senator Elizabeth Warren urged her supporters to “imagine that something better lies on the other side of the chaos and ugliness of the last three years” in a major speech on Tuesday.

headline.main: Warren Urges Democrats to ‘Imagine’ a Better America (and Her as President)
headline.print_headline: Looking for Momentum, Warren Delivers Message of Optimism

docs.abstract: Mr. Steyer, a billionaire running for president, rents his campaign headquarters in South Carolina from a daughter of the state’s most powerful Democrat, Representative James Clyburn.
docs.snippet: Mr. Steyer, a billionaire running for president, rents his campaign headquarters in South Carolina from a daughter of the state’s most powerful Democrat, Representative James Clyburn.
docs.lead_paragraph: As he courts voters across South Carolina, Tom Steyer, a billionaire businessman running for president, has lavished money on the black community — employing black-owned businesses, hiring African-Americans for his staff and buying ads with black-owned news organizations.

headline.main: Tom Steyer Stirs More Debate Over Payments in South Carolina
headline.print_headline: Steyer’s Payments to Blacks Fuel a Debate

docs.abstract: He thinks New York City should offer a universal basic income. (And he hasn’t ruled out running for mayor.)
docs.snippet: He thinks New York City should offer a universal basic income. (And he hasn’t ruled out running for mayor.)

headline.print_headline: Yang Is Out, but ‘Still Moving Forward’

docs.abstract: The Vermont senator tightened his grip on the Democratic Party’s liberal wing, benefiting from a field that has divided moderate voters.
docs.snippet: The Vermont senator tightened his grip on the Democratic Party’s liberal wing, benefiting from a field that has divided moderate voters.
docs.lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. — Senator Bernie Sanders narrowly won the New Hampshire primary on Tuesday, consolidating support on the left and fending off a late charge by two moderate rivals to claim his second strong showing in two weeks and establish himself as a formidable contender for the Democratic nomination.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Scores Narrow Victory in New Hampshire Primary
headline.print_headline: Sanders Is Winner in New Hampshire

byline.original: By Jonathan Martin and Alexander Burns

docs.abstract: Mr. Yang, an entrepreneur with no previous political experience, mounted a long-shot presidential campaign that promoted a universal basic income and persisted well beyond expectations.
docs.snippet: Mr. Yang, an entrepreneur with no previous political experience, mounted a long-shot presidential campaign that promoted a universal basic income and persisted well beyond expectations.
docs.lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. — Andrew Yang, an entrepreneur with no previous political experience who evangelized a universal basic income and warned of the perils of automation, ended his longer-than-long-shot bid for president on Tuesday night after a yearslong campaign that endured even as those of members of Congress and governors dropped out.

headline.main: Andrew Yang Drops Out: ‘It Is Clear Tonight From the Numbers That We Are Not Going to Win’
headline.print_headline: Yang Ends a Long-Shot Bid That Outlasted Bigger Names
